headline: How we made our DNS stack 3x faster
keywords: Reliability, DNS, Speed & Reliability, Speed, Growth, Cloudflare History
description: Cloudflare is now well into its 6th year and providing authoritative DNS has been a core part of infrastructure from the start. Weâ€™ve since grown to be the largest and one of the fastest managed DNS services on the Internet, hosting DNS for nearly 100,000 of the Alexa top 1M sites.
